Deficit Reduction Act of 2005 Online Training Events
Course Description Join us for an in-depth discussion on the Deficit Reduction Act of 2005 and its implications in the financial aid community. Our regulatory advisors will focus on any changes that may impact the administration of Title IV. In addition, we will highlight any regulatory updates or guidance that affects your students, past, present, and future.
Who Should Attend Any financial aid administrator interested in the most up to date information related to the Deficit Reduction Act of 2005.
How You Will Benefit Know what changes to anticipate as a result of the Deficit Reduction Act of 2005. Learn what aspects of the act could affect the way you administer Title IV funds.
